title: Dastjerd, Azarshahr
text: Dastjerd () is a village in <a href="Dastjerd%20Rural%20District%20%28East%20Azerbaijan%20Province%29">Dastjerd Rural District</a>, <a href="Gugan%20District">Gugan District</a>, <a href="Azarshahr%20County">Azarshahr County</a>, <a href="East%20Azerbaijan%20Province">East Azerbaijan Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 1,595, in 427 families.
